sentences.english: Tao Yuanming's poem which praised the autumn chrysanthemum revealed his noble character.
sentences.chinese: 陶淵明詠秋菊的詩篇顯示出他高潔的人格。

sentences.english: Now that you have high-minded ambition, I won't keep you strong.
sentences.chinese: 既然你有高潔的志向，我就不強留你了。

sentences.english: While wanting to gain noble and pure degree oil liquid, may adopt pair of in-line level essence filter.
sentences.chinese: 當想獲得高潔度油液時，可採用雙級串聯精濾。

sentences.english: I keep as delicate around the bowels as around the head and heart.
sentences.chinese: 我將肚腸保持的像頭腦和心臟那樣高潔。

sentences.english: He had company in and out of the hut all day, asking him how he could possibly be so noble.
sentences.chinese: 整天都有人進出他的小屋，請教他何以能夠如此高潔。

sentences.english: She always tried to lead a virtuous life.
sentences.chinese: 她一直想要過一種高潔的生活。

sentences.english: Two deities gather in the same place call its person of like pine and crane noble and pure longevity.
sentences.chinese: 兩神仙物合在一起即是稱其人如松鶴般高潔長壽。

sentences.english: The crane, by Taoism introduction fairyland, entrusts with the noble and pure sentiment will the connotation.
sentences.chinese: 鶴，被道教引入仙境，賦予高潔情志的內涵。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
